MetaData.MetaDataItem:
Smart Combustible Gas Sensor in a convenient wall plug form factor for easy installation.
Built-in audio and led notification systems for gas leakage detection events.
- Press the Net_Button 3 times within 1.5s - If remove Process is successful, Green LED is Blinking 6 times, then turn on

-Long press Net_Button at least 10 seconds in the device. -Device Reset Locally notification is Transmitted. Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.
- Press the Net_Button 3 times within 1.5s, Green LED is Blinking 3 times within 1 second. - If add Process is successful, Green LED will turn on.
